attributes.action: Encourage UK citizens to stop eating meat, dairy and other animal products.
attributes.additional_details: Show some love to the animals and ourselves!!
attributes.background: Even cutting down on meat and animals products is better for our health, many do not consider it because these animals products taste good but they are actually increasing our heart disease rate and blood sugar levels. For some, being vegan is shamed upon and weird but it shouldn’t be shown as that.
